content.query:
USE costmgmt
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW tsc_ACMMonthlyActualCostAggregatedPartitionByDate
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/partition_aggregate/parquet/ACMMonthlyActualCost_Aggregated_overview.parquet/*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
